Package org.openjump.core.ui.plugin.edittoolbox.cursortools

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AutoCompletePolygonCursorTool  
    ConstrainedDragTool
    The default implementation draws a selection box, but this can be overridden (even to draw nothing).
    ConstrainedMoveVertexTool  
    ConstrainedMultiClickArcTool
    A VisualIndicatorTool that allows the user to draw shapes with multiple vertices.
    ConstrainedMultiClickTool
    A VisualIndicatorTool that allows the user to draw shapes with multiple vertices.
    ConstrainedNClickTool  
    ConstrainedPolygonTool  
    CutFeaturesTool  
    CutPolygonTool
    This cursor tool is installed by CutPoygonSIGLEPlugIn To use it, select one or several Polygon a in layer A, draw a Polygon b by hand, every selected polygon a will be changed into a - b.

    FillPolygonTool  
    RemodelerTool  
    RotateSelectedItemTool  
    ScaleSelectedItemsTool  
    SelectMultiItemsTool
    A select tool opening a popup dialog to choose which feature to be selected when several superimposed features are located under the mouse.
